医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究将妊娠期高血压疾病与痴呆联系起来妊娠期高血压疾病（HDP）——包括慢性/妊娠期高血压和先兆子痫在内的高血压疾病——与晚年的心脏病密切相关，但在此之前，很少有研究将这些疾病与认知联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Research-links-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Research-links-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa7b69bf-8cf5-450d-a0ed-c06d84979ff2 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 08:01:48 -0400 Research links hypertensive disorders of pregnancy with dementia
超越健康记录：深度学习通过基于图像的表型分析增强疾病诊断研究人员探索了基于双能 X 射线吸收测定法 (DXA) 扫描的基于图像的表型分析的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Beyond-health-records-Deep-learning-enhances-disease-diagnosis-via-image-based-phenotyping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Beyond-health-records-Deep-learning-enhances-disease-diagnosis-via-image-based-phenotyping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a63361f1-dfa6-4998-a0d2-c258776b83f6 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 07:56:00 -0400 Beyond health records: Deep learning enhances disease diagnosis via image-based phenotyping
生活在“保护区外”的土著妇女在获得医疗保健方面面临许多差距CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）的最新研究发现，生活在“非保护区”的土著女性在医疗保健获取、使用和未满足的需求方面面临许多差异 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.221407 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Indigenous-women-living-off-reserve-face-many-disparities-in-health-care-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Indigenous-women-living-off-reserve-face-many-disparities-in-health-care-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41e14eb4-1223-47af-ab6a-e8c9332b4856 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 07:52:20 -0400 Indigenous women living "off reserve" face many disparities in health care access
流感和肺炎疫苗接种可降低阿尔茨海默病风险根据 2020 年阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议 (AAIC) 上报告的新研究，流感和肺炎疫苗接种可降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Influenza-and-pneumonia-vaccinations-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Influenza-and-pneumonia-vaccinations-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39c15f4a-4c26-45da-b06e-6fc478d4534a Mon, 28 Aug 2023 07:38:20 -0400 Influenza and pneumonia vaccinations associated with reduced risk of Alzheimer’s disease
以肠道微生物群为目标的重编程干预措施旨在预防心血管疾病的发生和进展的潜力研究人员讨论了基于益生菌和益生元的干预措施在治疗心血管疾病方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/The-potential-of-gut-microbiota-targeted-reprogramming-interventions-Design-to-prevent-the-onset-and-progression-of-cardiovian-疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/The-potential-of-gut-microbiota-targeted-reprogramming-interventions-Design-to-prevent-the-onset-and-progression-of-cardiovian-疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c460edd8-089b-4b29-a71d-a1df18bda07d Mon, 28 Aug 2023 07:37:00 -0400 The potential of gut-microbiota-targeted reprogramming interventions designed to prevent the onset and progression of cardiovascular diseases
研究发现用单一血液样本对发热性疾病进行分类的方法研究人员训练机器学习 (ML) 模型来分析患者血液中的 RNA 分子特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-discovers-method-to-classify-febrile-illness-with-a-single-blood-sample.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-discovers-method-to-classify-febrile-illness-with-a-single-blood-sample.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95e19238-3c5a-47df-a983-2c47400cfad5 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 06:33:00 -0400 Study discovers method to classify febrile illness with a single blood sample

由于极端高温引发健康问题，更多城市正在解决“遮荫沙漠”问题Javonne Mansfield 发誓，如果不是南麦克迪尔大道上的交通堵塞，你都能听到煎锅的嘶嘶声。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/More-cities-address-e28098shade-desertse28099-as-extreme-heat-triggers-health-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/More-cities-address-e28098shade-desertse28099-as-extreme-heat-triggers-health-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09a627e0-387d-4b90-bf30-b45d22673180 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 05:32:00 -0400 More cities address ‘shade deserts’ as extreme heat triggers health issues
